game.name: Pax Dei
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Welcome to a vast, social sandbox MMO inspired by the legends of the medieval era. Here, myths are real, ghosts exist, and magic is unquestioned. Join thousands of players as you explore the land, build your home, forge your reputation, and craft your own stories. What world will you make?
